text: (nabiyē!) manakkalpitava allāh mata boru gotā kiyannanṭa vaḍā, nætahot vahī magin ohuṭa kisivak dænum nodī tibiyadī “maṭat vahī pahaḷa viya” yayi pavasannāṭa vaḍā, nætahot “allāh pahaḷa kaḷa me(ma dharma)ya vænnak mamat pahaḷa karannemi” yayi pavasannāṭa vaḍā aparādhakārayā kavarekda? mema aparādhakārayin maraṇa maṁcakayehi siṭina avasthāvēdī oba ovunva dakinnehi nam, malāyikāvarun tamangē at digu kara, (ovunṭa) “obagē paṇa labā denu. ada dina avaman gena dena dan̆ḍuvamama obaṭa phalavipāka vaśayen denu labanu æta. oba satyaya novana dæya allāh kerehi (boru) kiyā ohugē āyāvanda u~gukama magin oba pratikṣēpa kirīmama meyaṭa hētu vē” (yayi pavasanu oba dakinnehiya)
